General.Name: Thai-German Products Public Company Limited
General.Description: Thai-German Products Public Company Limited engages in manufacture and distribution of stainless steel pipes, sheets, axles, and equipment in Thailand and internationally. It operates through three segments: Stainless Sales and Service; Stereo Sales; and Agriculture Selling. The company offers ornamental tubes; industrial stainless steel pipes; sanitary tubes for food, beverage, and pharmaceutical industries; heat exchanger/ boiler tubes; and stainless steel sheets for applications in furniture, kitchenware, refrigerator, indoor and outdoor decoration. It also offers services, such as coil slitting, coil polishing, and sheet cutting for automotive, cold storage, kitchenware, etc.; checking the quality of stainless-steel using spectrometer; and inspection testing services, including flanttening, flaring, flange, hydrostastic, and pneumatic tests. In addition, it engages in sale of stereo equipment, telephone equipment, and spare parts; sale and rent of plant green house; and sale of agricultural products, such as vegetables and seeds. The company was incorporated in 1973 and is headquartered in Rayong, Thailand.
